plot: Tamahl has lived with his stepfather, Jimmy, for seven years. But he never took the time to get to know him. Memory, identity and a question of love haunt this moving exploration of the complex relationships inside one family.
title: Driving with Jimmy
plot_es: Tamahl has lived with his stepfather, Jimmy, for seven years. But he never took the time to get to know him. Memory, identity and a question of love haunt this moving exploration of the complex relationships inside one family.
plot_en: Tamahl has lived with his stepfather, Jimmy, for seven years. But he never took the time to get to know him. Memory, identity and a question of love haunt this moving exploration of the complex relationships inside one family.
